```go
package main 
import ( 
  "flag" 
  "log" 
  "net/http" 
) 
func main() { 
  var addr = flag.String("addr", ":8081", "website address") 
  flag.Parse() 
  mux := http.NewServeMux() 
  mux.Handle("/", http.StripPrefix("/",  
    http.FileServer(http.Dir("public")))) 
  log.Println("Serving website at:", *addr) 
  http.ListenAndServe(*addr, mux) 
} 

```
